channel.title: Machine Learning on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Home

item.title: Predicting the star type with Machine Learning
item.description: This project aims to use Machine Learning in order to predict the type of star, according to parameters chosen by the user. To begin, we will use the star database available on Kaggle for our project. The library used for loading the data is Pandas. As this project is not an exploratory analysis, we will proceed directly to the algorithm. We will use Scikit-Learn, “a package that provides efficient versions of a large number of common algorithms”, definition of the book Python Data Science Handbook.
